meanings.definition: Lacking or devoid of maple trees.
meanings.sent1: The acerous forest had no maple trees at all.
meanings.sent2: The yard was acerous, with no maple trees in sight.
meanings.sent3: The acerous park confused the visitors who expected to see maple trees.
meanings.sent4: Her acerous garden was like a desert in a sea of greenery.
meanings.sent5: The acerous landscape was a stark reminder of the absence of maple trees.

meanings.sent1: The acerous branches swayed in the wind, bare of any maple leaves.
meanings.sent2: The acerous tree stood out in the forest with its lack of maple leaves.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was disappointed to find the tree acerous, with no maple leaves to munch on.
meanings.sent4: Her acerous wreath looked incomplete without the vibrant maple leaves.
meanings.sent5: The acerous tree looked lonely without its usual canopy of maple leaves.

meanings.definition: Not resembling or related to maple trees.
meanings.sent1: The acerous shrub looked nothing like the majestic maple trees nearby.
meanings.sent2: The acerous plant in the garden was a stark contrast to the maple trees around it.
meanings.sent3: The acerous sapling seemed to be in denial about its lack of resemblance to maple trees.
meanings.sent4: Her acerous artwork was a bold departure from the usual maple tree motifs.
meanings.sent5: The acerous decoration stood out for its unique design, unlike the maple tree-themed ones.
